text:
2017 NBA trade deadline hub: Time, date, completed deals, latest buzz Your one-stop shop for all things concerning the NBA trade deadline Post to Facebook 2017 NBA trade deadline hub: Time, date, completed deals, latest buzz Your one-stop shop for all things concerning the NBA trade deadline  //usat.ly/2m8Z7bO   2017 NBA trade deadline hub: Time, date, completed deals, latest buzz USA TODAY Published 4:30 p.m. ET Feb. 22, 2017 | Updated 16 minutes ago CLOSE Share DeMarcus Cousins was all smiles during his opening press conference with the New Orleans Pelicans. Chicago Bulls forward Jimmy Butler (21) shoots the ball against the Phoenix Suns during the second half at Talking Stick Resort Arena. (Photo: Joe Camporeale, USAT) CONNECT COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
As the NBA's trade deadline inches closer, teams are shuffling to improve their rosters for a playoff run or to better position themselves for the future. 
For all things NBA trade deadline, from completed deals to latest rumblings, USA TODAY Sports is your one-stop shop. 
Note: Completed deals are at the bottom of the page. Everything else is in chronological order, continuously updating. 
Trade deadline date: Thursday, Feb. 23 
Time: 3 p.m. ET 
The Nets are dealing Bojan Bogdanovic to the Wizards. Lottery protection on the 2017 first-round pick going from Wizards to Nets. So Nets will get it this year. @WojVerticalNBA first with trade. 
Paul George wants to stay with the Pacers — if they can win. On Paul George & the recent message he delivered to ownership that is driving Larry Bird's actions at the moment https://t.co/FZOT36wIeT — Sam Amick (@sam_amick) February 22, 2017 
Is Reggie Jackson staying put? Pistons aren't giving away Reggie Jackson, and while Magic GM Rob Hennigan loves Jackson, Orlando unlikely to get that deal done, I'm told. — Jeff Zillgitt (@JeffZillgitt) February 21, 2017 
GALLERY: Trade deadline tracker: Players on the move Facebook A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Bojan Bogdanovic to Washington Wizards. Anthony Gruppuso, USA TODAY Sports Andrew Nicholson to Brooklyn Nets. Rob Carr, Getty Images Chris McCullough to Washington Wizards. Ken Blaze, USA TODAY Sports Marcus Thornton to Brooklyn Nets. Rob Carr, Getty Images Lou Williams to Houston Rockets. Brad Mills, USA TODAY Sports Corey Brewer to Los Angeles Lakers. Troy Taormina, USA TODAY Sports DeMarcus Cousins to New Orleans Pelicans. Kirby Lee, USA TODAY Sports Omri Casspi to New Orleans Pelicans. Jeffrey Swinger, USA TODAY Sports Langston Galloway to Sacramento Kings. Jennifer Stewart, USA TODAY Sports Buddy Hield to Sacramento Kings. Troy Taormina, USA TODAY Sports Tyreke Evans to Sacramento Kings. Brad Penner, USA TODAY Sports Terrence Ross to Orlando Magic. Jennifer Stewart, USA TODAY Sports Serge Ibaka to Toronto Raptors. Kim Klement, USA TODAY Sports Mason Plumlee to Denver Nuggets. Sam Sharpe, USA TODAY Sports Jusuf Nurkic to Portland Trail Blazers.
